const response = await client.cluster.putComponentTemplate({
  name: "destination_template",
  template: {
    settings: {
      index: {
        number_of_replicas: 2,
        number_of_shards: 2,
        mode: "time_series",
        routing_path: ["metricset"],
      },
    },
    mappings: {
      properties: {
        "@timestamp": {
          type: "date",
        },
        metricset: {
          type: "keyword",
          time_series_dimension: true,
        },
        k8s: {
          properties: {
            tx: {
              type: "long",
            },
            rx: {
              type: "long",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
